data.name: Alice Smith
data.subject: Support Request
data.message: I need help with my recent order. Can someone contact me please?

data.name: Sarah Williams
data.subject: Detailed Inquiry
data.message: I am looking for a custom phone case with a specific design. The design includes multiple colors and I want to make sure the quality will be good. Can you tell me about the printing process, materials used, and estimated delivery time? Also, do you offer bulk discounts for orders over 10 pieces? I would also like to know about your return policy in case the product doesn't meet expectations.
